Package org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MetaSource
    Abstraction of a basic entry format for input into an Encoder, with specific bias to a MultiEncoder's format of Map input.
    MetaStream<T>
    Adds meta information retrieval to a Stream
    Sensor<T>
    Parent type for all Sensors.
    SensorFactory<T>
    Allows a level of indirection which makes calling Sensor.create(SensorFactory, SensorParams) a lot more concise (and usable in "fluent" style): Use...
    ValueList
    Contains rows of immutable Tuples
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchedCsvStream<T>
    Specialized Stream for CSV (Comma Separated Values) stream processing.
    BatchedCsvStream.BatchedCsvHeader
    Implementation of the @FunctionalInterface Header
    BatchedCsvStream.BatchSpliterator
    The internal batching Spliterator implementation.
    BatchedCsvStreamBenchmark
    Used to compare the default JDK parallel streaming performance with the custom batched streaming performance.
    BatchedCsvStreamTest  
    CSVSource
    Simple abstraction to hold the contents of a list of csv records indicated by a specified path.
    CSVSourceTest  
    FileSensor
    Default implementation of a Sensor for inputting data from a file.
    FileSensorTest  
    Header
    Meta data describing the fields, types and reset rules usually specified by a file header, but may be manually or programmatically set.
    HeaderTest
    Tests Header condition flag configuration and state management.
    HTMSensor<T>
    Decorator for Sensor types adding HTM specific functionality to sensors and streams.
    HTMSensorTest
    Higher level test than the individual sensor tests.
    ObservableSensor<T>
    Wraps an rx.Observable or Publisher event emitter which can be used to input CSV strings into a given Layer of a Region and Network by either manually calling Publisher.onNext(String) or by connecting an Observable to an existing chain of Observables (operations/transformations) which eventually yield an appropriate CSV String input.
    ObservableSensorTest
    Test that the ObservableSensor can be created using the same idioms as other Sensor types.
    Publisher
    Provides a clean way to create an rx.Observable with which one can input CSV Strings.
    Publisher.Builder<T>  
    PublisherTest
    Tests the structured process for building an Observable emitter (Publisher) which can validate a manually constructed input header and allow manual entry.
    SensorParams
    Implementation of named parameter tuples that is tightly keyed to only known keys in order to assist with proper formation and auto creation within a Network.
    SensorParams.Keys
    Convenience class to use as handle way to specify an expected String array of key values for each of the 3 known input configuration types.
    URISensor
    Sensor which creates its source stream from a URI Instances of this class should be obtained via the factory URISensor.create(SensorParams) method.
    URISensorTest
    This is a *MANUAL ONLY* test due to the dependency on network resources.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SensorFlags
    Designates field type and processing information.
    SensorParams.Keys.Args
